org.ligoj.app.plugin.prov.dao

Interface ProvQuoteRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ProvQuote,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ProvQuote,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ProvQuote,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ProvQuote>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ProvQuote,java.lang.Integer>, org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<ProvQuote,java.lang.Integer>

    public interface ProvQuoteRepository
extends org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<ProvQuote,java.lang.Integer>
    ProvQuote repository.

    • Method Detail

      • getComputeSummary

        @Query(value="SELECT q, COALESCE(COUNT(qi.id),0), COALESCE(SUM(qi.cpu*qi.minQuantity),0), COALESCE(SUM(qi.ram*qi.minQuantity),0), COALESCE(SUM(CASE qi.internet WHEN 0 THEN qi.minQuantity ELSE 0 END),0) FROM ProvQuote q LEFT JOIN q.instances AS qi LEFT JOIN qi.price AS ip LEFT JOIN ip.type AS i WHERE q.subscription.id = :subscription GROUP BY q")
java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> getComputeSummary(int subscription)
        Return the compute quote summary from the related subscription.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier linking the quote.
        Returns:
        The quote with aggregated details : Quote, amount of instances, total RAM and total CPU.

      • getStorageSummary

        @Query(value="SELECT q, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN qs.id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COALESCE(qi.minQuantity,1) END),0), COALESCE(SUM(qs.size*COALESCE(qi.minQuantity,1)),0) FROM ProvQuote q LEFT JOIN q.storages AS qs LEFT JOIN qs.quoteInstance AS qi WHERE q.subscription.id = :subscription GROUP BY q")
java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> getStorageSummary(int subscription)
        Return the storage quote summary from the related subscription.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier linking the quote.
        Returns:
        The quote with aggregated details : Quote, amount of storages and total storage.

      • getCompute

        @Query(value="FROM #{#entityName} AS q LEFT JOIN FETCH q.instances AS qi LEFT JOIN FETCH qi.price AS ip  LEFT JOIN FETCH ip.type AS i LEFT JOIN FETCH ip.term LEFT JOIN FETCH q.usage WHERE q.subscription.id = :subscription")
ProvQuote getCompute(int subscription)
        Return the compute quote details from the related subscription.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier linking the quote.
        Returns:
        The compute quote details : Quote, instance details and price details.

      • getStorage

        @Query(value="FROM ProvQuoteStorage AS qs INNER JOIN FETCH qs.price qsp INNER JOIN FETCH qsp.type LEFT JOIN FETCH qs.quoteInstance WHERE qs.configuration.subscription.id = :subscription")
java.util.List<ProvQuoteStorage> getStorage(int subscription)
        Return the storage quote details from the related subscription.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier linking the quote.
        Returns:
        The storage quote details with the optional linked instance.

      • countByNode

        @Query(value="SELECT COUNT (q) FROM #{#entityName} AS q INNER JOIN q.subscription AS s WHERE s.node.id = :node OR s.node.id LIKE CONCAT(:node, \':%\')")
long countByNode(java.lang.String node)
        Return the amount of quotes based on the related node.
        Parameters:
        node - The node identifier. Sub nodes are also involved.
        Returns:
        The amount of quotes based on the related node.
